content: That's so helpful, thank you! I'll definitely try to focus on proper alignment and incorporate those hamstring-specific stretches into my practice. I've been using blocks and straps in my home practice, and I can see how they can help deepen my stretches. By the way, have you got any recommendations for yoga classes or workshops that focus on yin yoga? I'm considering taking a yin yoga class on Sundays with Michael, the instructor from the restorative yoga workshop I attended last weekend.
